title: Cosmic Drift: Just Another Day at the Office
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, detailed illustration, retro 1960s/1970s science fiction comic book art style, thick black outlines, bold solid colors, dot matrix shading, 16:9 aspect ratio. A wide shot depicting a male astronaut in a classic white and orange space suit floating dramatically out of a large circular open hatch or window of a detailed, modular, grey space station. He is tethered by a yellow cord. Three surprised male crew members in vintage 1970s shirts are visible inside the cockpit watching the sudden event. The background features deep space, a distant complex space station structure with solar panels, a vibrant blue and magenta nebula, and the curve of planet Earth in the corner. Include classic comic text title elements and sound effects like 'WHOOSH!' and speech bubbles.
negativePrompt: low resolution, poorly drawn, blurry, watercolor, oil painting, photo, realistic texture, modern spacesuit, disfigured, wrong proportions, grayscale, nudity, complex shading
